message.content: {"id": "6536", "title": "Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing", "description": "When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, no action is performed. The expected behavior is either for this menu option to be removed or, preferably, for the action to add the Javadoc to the fields.", "OB": "Selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu on a field in TH does not perform any action.", "EB": "The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should perform the action of adding Javadoc to the selected field in TH.", "SR": "Fix the issue with the 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu so that it correctly adds Javadoc to the selected field in TH."}
